snippet: Jack B. Palmer says he has been harassed, given no work and denied bonuses since accusing his employer, Infosys, of misusing visitor visas.
abstract: Jack B Palmer, who accused his employer Infosys of visa fraud, contends he has been harassed by superiors and co-workers, sidelined with no work assignment, shut out of the company’s computers, denied bonuses and hounded by death threats; Palmer's plight serves as a cautionary tale about the perils of confronting a big corporation.
lead_paragraph: Jack B. Palmer says he has been harassed, given no work and denied bonuses since accusing his employer, Infosys, of misusing visitor visas.

headline.main: Whistle-Blower Claiming Visa Fraud Keeps His Job, but Not His Work
headline.print_headline: Whistle-Blower Claiming Visa Fraud Keeps His Job, but Not His Work
